Base Functions¶

as_tensor(data: numpy.ndarray, time: numpy.ndarray = None, is_sort=False) → timetensor.core.tensor.TimeTensor¶

This function receive a 2d data array and 1d time array, then return a TimeTensor

Parameters

  • data – ndarray - data 2d array the first dim is the time index and the second dim is the feature dim

  • time – ndarray - time 1d array

  • is_sort – bool - a flag is the input is sorted

Returns

TimeTensor - TimeTensor based on the input data

empty_tensor() → timetensor.core.tensor.TimeTensor¶

This function return an empty TimeTensor

Returns

an empty TimeTensor
